name: The Devils Crown
summary:
"... as the Pirates slowly remove the Sparkling Stones they feel a cold eerie 
wind pass through their hair. Suddenly, as the final Stone is removed from the 
Cursed Golden Crown a massive Devil from the darkest depths of Hell, is 
unleashed, murders all on board and sinks the ship... with the treasure". 
 
After many years of careful research the position of the pirate ship has been 
traced and legend speaks of death and evil on board. Do you dare to return to 
the sunken ship and recover the Seven Jewels which have been scattered around 
the 40 rooms of the wreck, and replace them in the Crown. Before you recover 
the jewels you must first prove yourself by replacing each flashing object 
with the equivalent solid object also hidden around the ship. Only then is a 
flashing jewel revealed which must be replaced by a solid jewel. 
 
However, with pirate ghosts guarding the jewels, killer fish and other 
nastiea your task is not an easy one, especially when you are in desperate 
need of oxygen.
